subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is situated in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सा फोट है।
explanation_en: Umaid Bhawan is a famous palace located in Jodhpur, which is also known as the residence of the royal family during the tough times. Mehrangarh Fort, Kalibaan, Rao Jodha ki Kala Kendra, and Chittorgarh Fort are also notable forts in Rajasthan, but Umaid Bhawan stands out as the residence of the royal family.
